Chile: Beginning of the Defensive War phase (promoted by Luis de Valdivia) in the Arauco War.
India:
British India (to 1947)
East India Company (to 1857 – Indian Rebellion of 1857, Meerut)
Philippine: Fr. Domingo Gonzalez, O.P. appointed to work on the completion of the organization of the Colegio de Nuestra Señora del Santísimo Rosario (presently the University of Santo Tomas in Manila)
The Colegio de Nuestra Señora del Santísimo Rosario (presently the University of Santo Tomas in Manila) formally opens
Russia: Polish–Russian War (1609–1618): Muscovite populace rising against the Poles recaptured the Kremlin.
